column1: 179.  (1)  The  Commission  may  take  one  or  more  of  the  following  actions  where  a
market intermediary who handles or is entrusted with monies of clients or assets in
the  course of his business  contravenes  any provision  of this  Act, regulation,  rule  or
directive issued thereunder or is no longer fit and proper and the Commission is of the
view that interests of investors, the clients of a market intermediary or unit holders of
collective investment schemes are likely to be jeopardized, or are jeopardized-
